StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetRecruitersWithTrainingFile]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@OrgID int AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT M.MARINE_ID, M.rowguid, rp.RANK_CODE + ' ' + RTRIM(p.LAST_NAME) + ' ' + p.FIRST_NAME + ' ' + ISNULL(p.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME, '') AS DisplayName, rp.ORGANIZATION_ID, M.BILLET_MOS FROM MCRISS.dbo.MARINE AS M INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.PERSON AS p ON M.MARINE_ID = p.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_PERSON AS rp ON M.MARINE_ID = rp.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID INNER JOIN TrainingFile AS . ON M.rowguid = ..RecruiterID --WHERE (rp.ORGANIZATION_ID = @orgID) AND (rp.DELETED = 'N') AND (M.BILLET_MOS = '8411') --Old WHERE clause WHERE rp.ORGANIZATION_ID = @orgID AND rp.TOUR_END_DATE IS NULL AND M.BILLET_MOS IN ('8411', '8412') AND ..ArchivedDate IS NULL ORDER BY p.LAST_NAME ASC
END
